entities/Flashcard.json: {"name": "Flashcard", "type": "object", "properties": {"set_id": {"type": "string", "description": "ID of the flashcard set this belongs to"}, "question": {"type": "string", "description": "The question or front of the card"}, "answer": {"type": "string", "description": "The answer or back of the card"}, "explanation": {"type": "string", "description": "Additional explanation or context"}, "difficulty": {"type": "string", "enum": ["easy", "medium", "hard"], "default": "medium"}, "order_index": {"type": "number", "description": "Order of the card in the set"}, "image_url": {"type": "string", "description": "URL of an image associated with the question"}}, "required": ["set_id", "question", "answer"]}
entities/FlashcardSet.json: {"name": "FlashcardSet", "type": "object", "properties": {"title": {"type": "string", "description": "Title of the flashcard set"}, "subject": {"type": "string", "description": "Subject or category"}, "description": {"type": "string", "description": "Description of the flashcard set"}, "difficulty": {"type": "string", "enum": ["beginner", "intermediate", "advanced"], "default": "intermediate"}, "tags": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}, "description": "Tags for organization"}, "source_type": {"type": "string", "enum": ["ai_generated", "document_upload", "manual", "image_query"], "description": "How the flashcards were created"}, "source_file_url": {"type": "string", "description": "URL of uploaded document if applicable"}, "cover_image_url": {"type": "string", "description": "Cover image for the flashcard set"}}, "required": ["title", "subject"]}
entities/TestSession.json: {"name": "TestSession", "type": "object", "properties": {"set_id": {"type": "string", "description": "ID of the flashcard set being tested"}, "score": {"type": "number", "description": "Test score as percentage"}, "total_questions": {"type": "number", "description": "Total number of questions in the test"}, "correct_answers": {"type": "number", "description": "Number of correct answers"}, "time_taken": {"type": "number", "description": "Time taken to complete test in seconds"}, "answers": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "object", "properties": {"question_id": {"type": "string"}, "user_answer": {"type": "string"}, "correct_answer": {"type": "string"}, "is_correct": {"type": "boolean"}}}}}, "required": ["set_id", "score", "total_questions", "correct_answers"]}
